channel.title: Router connection help
channel.description: For some odd reason when i host a server, i can only get a max of 12 people on =\ I cant get any more, and im not sure how to change this, i already checked playerhandler.java and the other stuff like that, it all didnt work, i still can only have a max of 12. Help plz?

item.title: Router connection help
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“n0va k0, post:4, topic:189285”][quote author=Frell link=topic=252155.msg2109452#msg2109452 date=1205557113]

I’m probably no help but are you using a wireless router plugged into your computer? Or maybe no router? It lags more if you don’t have a router

Im using a wireless linksys router
[/quote]

If it’s a normal computer then it’ll lag like mess :l if it’s a laptop I don’t really know the problem. I had the same problem on my computer. I unplugged something from my router to my computer to host on it then it lagged alot. Switched to laptop, everything was good. I use WRT54G :[/quote]
The problem isn’t lagg, its how many people can connect, if someone tries to logg on when 12 people are already on, it says error connecting to server. My server has no lagg.

Read full topic

item.title: Router connection help
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:

[quote=“Frell, post:3, topic:189285”][quote author=n0va k0 link=topic=252155.msg2109430#msg2109430 date=1205556438]
I’m probably no help but are you using a wireless router plugged into your computer? Or maybe no router? It lags more if you don’t have a router
[/quote]
Im using a wireless linksys router[/quote]

If it’s a normal computer then it’ll lag like mess :l if it’s a laptop I don’t really know the problem. I had the same problem on my computer. I unplugged something from my router to my computer to host on it then it lagged alot. Switched to laptop, everything was good. I use WRT54G :\

Read full topic
